mapper.insert: insert into car_order (id, auction_id, order_no, car_id, customer_id, transaction_fee,bargain_fee, service_fee, pay_time, pay_fee, pay_auth_time, pay_auth_manager, status, lock_fee, create_time, pay_end_time,auto_auction_id,remark,agent_fee,amount_fee,auction_bid_record_id,manager_evaluate,user_evaluate) values (#{id}, #{auctionId}, #{orderNo}, #{carId}, #{customerId}, #{transactionFee}, #{bargainFee}, #{serviceFee}, #{payTime}, #{payFee}, #{payAuthTime}, #{payAuthManager}, #{status}, #{lockFee}, #{createTime}, #{payEndTime},#{autoAuctionId},#{remark},#{agentFee},#{amountFee},#{auctionBidRecordId},#{managerEvaluate},#{userEvaluate})
mapper.update:
update car_order
auction_id = #{auctionId},
order_no = #{orderNo},
car_id = #{carId},
customer_id = #{customerId},
transaction_fee = #{transactionFee},
bargain_fee = #{bargainFee},
service_fee = #{serviceFee},
pay_time = #{payTime},
pay_fee = #{payFee},
pay_auth_time = #{payAuthTime},
pay_auth_manager = #{payAuthManager},
status = #{status},
lock_fee = #{lockFee},
create_time = #{createTime},
pay_end_time = #{payEndTime},
auto_auction_id = #{autoAuctionId},
remark = #{remark},
agent_fee = #{agentFee},
amount_fee = #{amountFee},
auction_bid_record_id = #{auctionBidRecordId},
manager_evaluate = #{managerEvaluate},
user_evaluate = #{userEvaluate},
where id = #{id}

update car_order set auction_id = #{auctionId}, order_no = #{orderNo}, car_id = #{carId}, customer_id = #{customerId}, transaction_fee = #{transactionFee}, service_fee = #{serviceFee}, pay_time = #{payTime}, pay_fee = #{payFee}, pay_auth_time = #{payAuthTime}, pay_auth_manager = #{payAuthManager}, status = #{status}, lock_fee = #{lockFee}, create_time = #{createTime}, pay_end_time = #{payEndTime}, manager_evaluate = #{managerEvaluate}, user_evaluate = #{userEvaluate} where id = #{id}
